Package: org.grails.plugins.elasticsearch

[Groovy] Class ElasticSearchBootStrapHelper

    • org.grails.plugins.elasticsearch.ElasticSearchBootStrapHelper

    • Created by @marcos-carceles on 13/01/15. Created and exposed as a bean, because Bootstrap cannot be easily tested and invoked from IntegrationSpec
